answers.answer: Its better to pass it than fail it. But lol I feel you. I would've needed food too :( but what have you been eating doe? Nothing? :o cuss I don't take my test till October x)
i didnt fast for mine. i know some doctors say too. it makes no sense to make a pregnant woman fast. im sorry :/ just try not to get sick and keep it down so you dont have to go through it again :/
I have mine next week and I am nervous I'll fail it, my coworker did and has to go back for the 3 hr one. So I hope i pass the first one.good luck
I fasted when I went and passed it thank goodness because If the hour one feels like forever imagine the 2 hour one but it will be over before you know it!(:

Ah :( yeah I haven't eaten anything so I packed something so straight after I can shove it in my mouth lol.And yes I don't understand how they can make a pregnant women fast!! I hope I pass it I don't want to do the three hour one!! I'm only 17 weeks so they are doing this one early due to my mum having gestional diabetes and then I have another one at 26 weeks :,(

Smart thinking I didn't do tht when I went but I made sure I had the appointment in the early morning!I know I don't know how they can do tht to us oh no tht ***** well I hope you and your baby pass and everything turns out good! Good luck (:

question: I'm going for my test in half hour and I have been fasting since 10pm last night, I feel so sick I feel like I want to be sick :,( I need food..
title: Glocouse Test
